cu.explanation_en: Setting SCTP input streams to 0 will cause SCTP connection establishment failure between CU and DU, preventing F1 interface setup.

du.explanation_en: Setting SIB1 TDA to a negative value (-1) will cause system information broadcast configuration errors and prevent proper cell access.
du.explanation_zh: 將 SIB1 TDA 設定為負值 (-1)，會導致系統資訊廣播配置錯誤，並阻止正確的細胞接入。
